## Project: Bhandara Near You

This is a React TypeScript application for finding and sharing bhandara information with dark theme and Supabase integration.

### Project Status:

### Requirements Summary:

- React + TypeScript application
- Dark theme only (no light mode)
- No sign in/up required
- Form for adding bhandara details (location, landmark, photos, menu)
- Card-based display of bhandara information
- Auto-deletion after 24 hours
- Supabase integration for data storage
- Real-time updates for new submissions
